channel.title: [667/7**] Changing Maximum Run Energy
channel.description:
Hey,
I was just curious to how I would go upon changing the run energy to be unlimited.
I have tried going into player.java and changing the maximum run percentage from 100, to 2147M but obviously, that gave an error.
If anyone knows how, I would appreciate a small bit of help.
Thanks.
